ygData.subject: Re: Back to buisness.
ygData.msgSnippet: The council considers Predicons as expendable tools. Tripredicus doesn t have the sense of fellowship and morality you Maximals have. If they want something

"The council considers Predicons as expendable tools. Tripredicus 
doesn't have the sense of fellowship and morality you Maximals have. 
If they want something to happen losses are irrelevant. Especially 
losses that won't exist after the missions completed. Megatron, Hell 
Beast, Tarantulis, Galvatron, thier all Predacon leaders with the 
desure to overthrow the council and take control themselves. they 
were given these types of assignments to remove them from opposition, 
permanently." so if they want us deleted then theres noyhing we can 
do but succeed or die." The spider can speak of his own kind that way 
because he sees the same aspects in himself. He didn't care about how 
many Maximals or Predicons lost thier sparks, as long as he survived 
is what mattered.

"These are the files I've obtained on the Predicon ship, I also know 
through reliable sources that Magmatron's out to either capture it 
for himself or destroy it." Phobia sets files on the table between 
the others. "The Cybertronian Fire may have the firepower to turn the 
tide of battle. Besides, a ship of this magnifficence should be in 
space, not stuck on this primitive planet." Phobia knew what question 
would come next, he just wanted to hear Kluster ask.
(If you don't know the question it's how can we get this ship off the 
ground without engines?)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> For your information, JP, the newcomers didn't attack the 
Cybertronian Fire, 
> they attacked the Ark. The Cybertronian Fire is still fully 
functional, 
> except for the engines.
> 
> ::Kluster::
> 
> Kluster nods, the info that Phobia had given his sinking 
in. "Destroy this 
> planet?" Kluster frowns, "They would first rescue the predacons. 
This is 
> serious," he looks at Phobia, "The Council wouldn't do that, it 
would destroy 
> most of their army."
> 
> He stands up, going to a comp console. "Are you suggesting we 
attack the Iron 
> Fist?"
